Node.definition: marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which humans place other humans or objects in a certain location

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to stretch out (one's) tent; hence: = causative action by which humans erect their tent by stretching out the tent curtains over a structure of poles
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: name; hence: = state in which someone acts with the authority of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children
= a quantity of bread that is baked as one piece
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= cake ◄ made out of dates and cooked or raw cereals
= cake; ◄ made of dried, compressed grapes; ► possibly eaten at festivals and other special ceremonies

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= various men; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite; time of king David (דָּוִד)

= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= various men; ► Levites; time of David (דָּוִד)
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: head; hence: = the point in time at which an event starts happening
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)

= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= an activity performed by a person or deity
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which humans utter words with the focus on what is said

= action by which humans express their pride and satisfaction about themselves, their actions, certain circumstances they find themselves in, or a deity that they consider responsible for those circumstances
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= supernatural act of a deity, ◄ performed by the deity himself or in his name; ►in order to assert his power and greatness
= the outcome of a dispute between two or more parties, decided by a judge or a deity
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= individual or group of people especially selected and appointed for a certain purpose
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
= piece of land; ► owned or occupied by an individual or a group of people
= human beings, regardless of sex and age
= state in which objects are relatively low in quantity, or in which events are relatively low in frequency
= small quantity of objects or substance

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
literally: to touch; hence: = causative action by which humans, deities or forces cause harm to humans or objects
a (non eschatological) religious leader appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

= a certain quantity that fill a certain container

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= man; ◄ son of Jeduthun (יְדוּתוּן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► gatekeeper for the ark (אֲרֹון) and harp player
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= state in which a countable entity is sixty in number
= state in which a countable entity is eight in number
= man; ◄ son of Jeduthun (יְדוּתוּן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► gatekeeper for the ark (אֲרֹון) and harp player
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)|read יְדוּתוּן Jeduthun with
= man; ◄ descendant of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► head of family of gatekeepers
= a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= a portable construction, also referred to as the Tent of the Testimony or the Tent of Meeting, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used to put the ark of the covenant with the stone tablets on which the testimony was written, before Solomon's temple was built
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= place of worship, often situated in an elevated location, but not necessarily so
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► one of the four Hivite (חִוִּי) cities that made a covenant with Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ◄ son of Joel (יֹואֵל) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)
= causative action by which someone carefully examines a group of objects in order to determine whether they meet certain criteria, by which all that do not meet those criteria will be removed
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to be called by name; hence: = process by which humans are selected from a larger group ◄ by having their name called out
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= man; ◄ son of Joel (יֹואֵל) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)
= tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which humans return to the place from which they came
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
